title: Vodi™
description:
Vodi is the only financial app with a mission to give back to our users. We offer global products such as money transfer, prepaid mobile recharge, eGift cards, and international calling alongside with powerful communication tools. You can potentially get $10 USD or more per month in rewards just for staying connected.
In addition, Vodi is introducing the Decentralized eCommerce Ecosystem, Vodi X (www.VodiX.io), a service built on top of the Vodi platform that unites employers and unbanked communities.
---
Vodi is the one stop shop for:
• Send Money instantly and safely to loved ones to 25 countries (visit our website for current available countries)
• The ability to send eGift Cards instantly worldwide to friends and family in 15 countries with 100 plus popular brands (more coming soon).
• Recharge prepaid mobile phones for yourself or loved ones in more than 135 countries and 390 mobile destinations
• Make affordable international calls with Vodi Out from anywhere to anywhere
• Enjoy unlimited texting, voice calling and high-quality voice calling over WiFi, 3G, 4G and LTE
• Share photos and videos with friends and family
• Sticker Store
• Voting Platform
• Stars for Charity
• Micro Tasking
